927.question: What previous methods is the proposed method compared against?
927.response:
The proposed method is compared against the following previous methods:
- BLSTM+Attention+BLSTM (2019)
- Hierarchical BLSTM-CRF (2018)
- CRF-ASN (2018)
- Hierarchical CNN (window 4) (2017)
- mLSTM-RNN (2018)
- DRNN-Conditional (2016)
- LSTM-Softmax (2016)
- RCNN (2013)
- CNN (2016)
- CRF (2010)
927.answer:
BLSTM+Attention+BLSTM
Hierarchical BLSTM-CRF
CRF-ASN
Hierarchical CNN (window 4)
mLSTM-RNN
DRLM-Conditional
LSTM-Softmax
RCNN
CNN
CRF
LSTM
BERT
